name: Finalist of Chain Fusion Hacker - ICP
description: As a finalist in the Chain Fusion Hacker competition, I contributed to advancing Web3 technologies by developing seamless, user-friendly decentralized applications. My work focused on overcoming interoperability challenges, enhancing the usability of dApps, NFTs, and smart contracts, and bridging the gap between various blockchain platforms.

name: Finalist of ICPC Asia Jakarta National Contest
description: As a finalist in the ICPC Asia Jakarta National Contest, I competed against top teams from various universities in the region. The contest challenged us to solve complex algorithmic problems under time constraints, test our teamwork and problem-solving skills, and showcase our programming abilities. It was a rewarding experience that honed my competitive spirit and technical expertise.
